ramp.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a slope that has been built to connect two places that are at different levels
ramp.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Ramps are needed at exits and entrances for wheelchair users.
ramp.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a road for driving onto or off a large main road
ramp.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Take the Lake Drive ramp at Charles Street.
They missed the off-ramp to Manhattan.
